GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a phrase and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. A: Has Elizabeth got a computer?
B: Yes,she has.
000
2. A: Have Mr and Mrs Klein got any children?
B: No, they haven't.
000
3. A: Have Eric and Petra got a dishwasher?
B: Yes,they have.
000
4. A: Have we got any wine in the fridge?
B:Yes,we have.
000
5. A: Has your brother got a girlfriend?
B: No,he hasn't.
000
6. A: Have you got a one euro coin?
B: No,I haven't.
000
7. A: Have we got any coffee?
B: No,we haven't.
000
8. A: Have you got an email address?
B: Yes,I have.
000
9. A: Has your father got a good job?
B: Yes,he has.
000
10. A: Has their house got three bedrooms?
B: No,it hasn't.
000
